column1: Meteorological data are one of the most important inputs for crop water demand models. Although organisations like the WMO have standardized collection and calibration methods for their global station network
column2: the data collected by other institutions or from global assimilation products might vary slightly for the same location. Also
column3: a local station may be closer to the area to be assessed. It is therefore essential to compare the data and to be aware of the limitations in accuracy.

column1: The Hebei irrigation norm differentiates between irrigation demand for normal years (50% precipitation reliability) and for dry years (75% precipitation reliability). The irrigation calculator allows the computation of the irrigation water demand using the same methods as the Hebei irrigation norm.
This is the core component of the Irrigation Demand Calculator. The computation of irrigation water demand is based on the CROPWAT model
column3: soil type and crop planting dates. CROPWAT is a decision support tool developed by the Land and Water Division of FAO. More information can be found on http://www.fao.org/land-water/databases-and-software/cropwat/en/

column4: Irrigation Schedule. In accordance with the Hebei irrigation norm (DB13/T1161.1-2009)
column5: the irrigation calculator differentiates between 3 soil types: Loamy sand (sand)
column7: and clay. The irrigation schedule defines when or under which conditions the field is irrigated to increase the soil water content. Only 2 irrigation schedules are available (once a month and minimum irrigation):  Two options are available: 1. The field is irrigated such that the soil water content is at field capacity at the end of the month (Once a Month) 2. The field is irrigated such that the water content is always at wilting point (Minimum Irrigation).

column1: The Hebei irrigation norm (DB13/T1161.1-2009) has defined correction factors for irrigation water demand to account for water losses in the irrigation system and the application of different irrigation technologies (see table below).
气象数据是计算作物需水量中不可缺少的因素之一。尽管世界气象组织的观测站数据都经过标准化的数据收集和校正，其它机构的站台或者全球同化数据产品对于相同地点的观测数据依旧会有些许差异。因此，使用不同数据前请对比数据源之间的差异，了解所用数据的精度限制。
河北省灌溉定额按照一般年份（降水保障率为50％）和中等偏旱年份（降水保障率为75％）来界定灌溉需水量。 灌溉计算器也可以选择使用河北省灌溉定额来计算灌溉用水需求。
本工具的核心功能在于计算作物的灌溉需水量。灌溉计算器依据FAO的CropWat模型，能够针对不同作物种类在不同土壤条件和种植日期下估算所需要的灌溉用水。CropWat模型由FAO的土地水资源部门开发，更多信息请参考 http://www.fao.org/land-water/databases-and-software/cropwat/en/。

作物类型，土壤类型，种植日期，灌溉方式。灌溉计算器包括了3种土壤类型：壤砂土（砂土），砂壤土（壤土）和粘土，跟河北灌溉定额（DB13 / T1161.1-2009）采用的土壤类型一致。灌溉方式定义了何时或在何种条件下灌溉以增加土壤含水量。 有两种灌溉方式可供选择（月底灌溉和最低限度灌溉）：1. 每月月底灌溉：每月月底灌溉，使土壤含水量达到田间持水量; 2.最低限度灌溉：灌溉使土壤含水量始终处于凋萎点。
河北省灌溉定额（DB13 / T1161.1-2009）定义了针对灌溉规模和灌溉方式不同而需采用的灌溉定额修正系数（参见下表）。
Crop Water Deficit: The amount of irrigation water per unit area that is required in a season with average rainfall to provide Crop ET. As in the Hebei irrigation norm (DB13/T1161.1-2009)
column2: the irrigation demand for vegetables is for two growth seasons of the same crop within a year.

column1: Crop ET: The amount of water that this unit area of field and crop would consume by evapotranspiration given a sufficient water supply (zero water-stress). One part of this amount is supplied by rainfall
column2: the rest by irrigation. An initial soil water storage is taken into account.

column1: A specific area of a chosen crop with selected settings can be added to the Irrigation Planning Table
column2: where a summary of the total irrigation water demand will be given. The actual irrigation water demand should take account of water losses due to irrigation area and different irrigation technologies
column3: and it is different from the crop water deficit.

column1: A summary of all crop field areas that have been added to the irrigation planning table is shown here. At the top of the page
column2: a graph of the monthly irrigation water demand is shown. The table below shows an overview of all crop field areas added so far with their key values. The irrigation water demand for a single field can be compared to the total water demand by activating the checkbox on the right.

column1: It is possible to save the created Irrigation Planning Table by pressing the button Save Table. The table is then securely stored on the server. For this action
column2: a user account must be created. The saved table can be loaded at a later point from the user account. It is also possible to download the data as Microsoft Excel file.

column1: The remotely sensed enhanced vegetation index (EVI) gives an indication of the photosynthetic activity of vegetation cover and thus serves as a proxy of the evapotranspiration rate that can be expected from this vegetation cover. A value of zero means no vegetation and a value close to +1 (0.8 - 0.9) indicates the highest possible density of green leaves.
Data are collected continuously from MODIS images every 8 days to enable a near real-time monitoring of the EVI. The map shows the most current data collected for a chosen region. A value of a local
column2: circular area can be extracted by clicking on the map. The size of the circle can be changed with the slider in the Map Control Menu. By activating the option “Compute Time Series” the historical course of the vegetation cover for the selected circular area can be computed and compared to the regional average.

column1: 作物缺水量： 在平水年条件下作物的灌溉需水量。与河北省灌溉定额（DB13 / T1161.1-2009）一样，蔬菜的灌溉需水量是一年内同一作物的两个生长季节。
作物的蒸散发量： 单位区域内在供水充足的条件下作物的蒸散发量。作物蒸散发过程中消耗的水量一部分由雨水补给，一部分由灌溉和土壤中储存的水分提供。
所选作物的计算结果可以被提交到“灌溉计划表”。实际灌溉用水量应该考虑不同灌溉规模和灌溉方式的损耗不同，数值会与作物缺水量不同。
所有提交的作物计算结果将在这里集中显示。最上方显示作物逐月灌溉需水量柱状图，而下方以表格形式显示每个作物的关键信息。通过激活表格最右边的选项，用户可以比较每种作物的灌溉蓄水量和总蓄水量之间的差别。
按保存计划表按键就可以保存创建的灌溉计划表。 灌溉计划表可以被存储在服务器上。 用户如果想要保存所创建的灌溉计划表，就需要创建用户帐户。 保存的计划表可以在以后从用户帐户加载。 也可以将数据生成微软的 Excel文件下载。
通过遥感技术获得的增强型植被指数(EVI)用于指示植被的光合作用强度，可间接用于推算植被的蒸散发量。当指数接近0时表示无植被覆盖，而接近1的时候代表单位区域内绿色植被的覆盖密度较强。
系统每8天自动收集MODIS数据来保证近实时的观测操作。地图上所显示的结果为选定区域最新EVI数据。用户可以点击地图提取指定半径内的EVI数据。圆圈的半径大小可以通过地图控制菜单下的滑条进行更改。另外，通过激活 “计算时间序列”选项，系统将计算所选区域内的EVI指数时间序列，并与区域均值进行比较。

The irrigation calculator was initially designed for Guantao county in the Hebei province. It has been up-scaled to include all counties of the Heilonggang Low Plains of Hebei province, for which the same irrigation norms apply according to the Hebei irrigation norm DB13T/116.1-2009.

Estimating irrigation water demand is crucial to plan irrigation schedules and to optimize water use efficiency accordingly. This online platform provides a flexible way for Guantao’s stakeholders to quickly look into irrigation water requirements as a function of crop type, soil type and planting date. It allows to add up the individual water demands of all areas with a specific crop and irrigation type to obtain the water requirements of the whole county or a subset thereof in a planning table. The calculation routine is based on FAO's CropWat model (see more information on the Help tab).

This tool was developed by hydrosolutions ltd. in Zurich, Switzerland. For questions or queries please fill the questionnaire under Help tab to contact us, or visit our website

\灌溉计算器最初是为河北省馆陶县设计的。现扩大到河北省黑龙港低平原地区的所有灌溉用水定额跟馆陶县一样的县（具体见河北灌溉规范DB13T / 116.1-2009）。

如何估计作物的灌溉需求对于制定灌溉计划至关重要，同时也有利于优化灌溉用水效率。此在线平台旨在为馆陶县水利部门的决策者们提供一个简单易用的工具，能够快速针对不同作物、土壤类型以及种植时间计算相应的灌溉需水量。所有的计算公式基于联合国农业和粮食组织(FAO) 的CropWat模型（详情请参考“帮助”栏）。
